content:
Hi all,
I will arrive in Marseille (at the train station) on Sunday around 3PM. If you've never been to the CIRM and you will be there we can go together (I will take public transportation.
I will probably arrive by the same train as you (15:04), let's meet at Saint Charles!
Mine is 14:56, but OK!
My flight lands at 1:25, and I'll stop by Saint Charles on my way to Luminy. I'm comfortable getting to CIRM, but we can meet also.
Hi All, I arrive at 5.14 PM in case there is a second batch of people who have never been at CIRM and would like to meet and travel to Luminy together.
@JB Stiegler and I will arrive by train at 12:14. I’ve never been to CIRM and I don’t think Jean Baptiste has, so we will probably wait around the station and join the first group at 3PM I think.
I'm also on the train that arrives at 15:04, assuming the first train makes it to Valence on time.
Hi everyone, I’m supposed to arrive by bus at 2:45 PM and I’ve never been to the CIRM.
By the way, is it possible to arrive at CIRM before 17h or is it closed?
I believe it's closed but there are nice benches around it and the weather should be nice, so it's not a big issue

Pietro Monticone said:

Hi everyone, I’m supposed to arrive by bus at 2:45 PM and I’ve never been to the CIRM.

Riccardo's instructions in his mail yesterday were quite complete, I believe. Have you received it? Of course you can also wait two and a half hours for me, but it won't be great fun in the railway station, while if you go up and meet the others it could be nice.

Filippo A. E. Nuccio said:

Pietro Monticone said:

Hi everyone, I’m supposed to arrive by bus at 2:45 PM and I’ve never been to the CIRM.

Riccardo's instructions in his mail yesterday were quite complete, I believe. Have you received it?

Yes, I received it and it’s clear. Thank you.

Vincent Beffara said:

I believe it's closed but there are nice benches around it and the weather should be nice, so it's not a big issue

In that case I would be up for a nice pastis in town before going there :-)
This is a good idea!

Yes, stopping in Marseille would be nice. Of course, we could also go hiking through the Calanques National Park, but there should be time for that during the week too, so probably spending some time in Marseille is better.
I won't be arriving till Wednesday afternoon unfortunately, but I'm looking forward to seeing everyone once I do get there!
I'll be arriving on Monday, hopefully around lunch time.
I'm only arriving in Marseille at 21:14 tomorrow but I've been to CIRM before.
Does anyone know a convenient precise meeting point for tomorrow at Marseille St-Charles?
Not really, but the station is not very big if I remember correctly
We can just choose a random place, like in front of the macdonald (if it still exists)
As long as it's not inside the macdonald ;-)
Is anyone here already ? We just arrived (with 50mins of delay…)
I've just arrived at CIRM. But I think I'm really early since I can't see anyone at reception yet or any envelopes.
It opens at 5pm I think
Hmm yeah just saw that in the email. It's fine, it's a nice day to walk around :) I've not seen this much sun in months :sob:
Is the building open at least?
yep!
I'm on a bus. I should arrive at St Charles right around 3.
I'm on a train, passing through Avignon right now, arriving around 3 as well
Same
I am currently traveling by bus and expect to arrive at St. Charles around 3 PM.
I don’t see any McDonald’s in the station…
I am at St. Charles right now, I don’t see any McDonald inside the station. Now I am near a ‘Parfois’ and a ‘Relay’.
Sorry, it existed like 5 years ago :sweat_smile:
We’re waiting to see where the 2:56 train arrives, and we’ll go to this platform
Ok, I am on that train with a couple of other participants
So far we don’t know the platform
Platform F
Voie F
I'm in the very next train IIUC (3:04) but I will join you at the head of platform F
Arriving voie G
We are just outside the station
It's nicer than inside
straight ahead from platform C, on the same level (don't go down the steps)
Arrived, but I don’t see you all.
Where are you ? We are outside of the building
@Frédéric Dupuis are you somewhere near the train station?
Anyone else is arriving soon?
If you're looking for a place to work, you can go to the library (using the badge of the key of your room)
There are tables and small rooms to discuss
I'm arriving at the train station at 19:30, in case anyone else is arriving around that time.
I'm in a bus to St Charles. Looking forward to meeting you all in ~ 1hr.
I'm arriving tonight very late at St Charles (23h23). If you're also arriving late, ping me if you want to share a cab or take the same bus !
Which building should I walk to now?
Restaurant
It's connected to the registration building
Due to illness I could not travel and I missed the first few days. But I made it, finally! Looking forward to seeing you all for dinner tonight.
Some people are not eating at CIRM tonight since this afternoon was free, but you’ll see everyone tomorrow!
